verses.text: \w Six|strong="G1803"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w later|strong="G3326"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w took|strong="G3880"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* brothers \w James|strong="G2385"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w led|strong="G2424"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w high|strong="G5308"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w* \w alone|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w There|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w appearance|strong="G4383"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w transformed|strong="G3339"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* eyes; \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* \w shone|strong="G2989"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w sun|strong="G2246"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w clothes|strong="G2440"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w*.

\w All|strong="G2532"\w* \w at|strong="G2532"\w* once \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Elijah|strong="G2243"\w* \w appeared|strong="G3708"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3708"\w*, \w talking|strong="G4814"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w*.

“\w Master|strong="G2962"\w*,” \w exclaimed|strong="G3004"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, interposing, “\w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w*; \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w wish|strong="G2309"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w tents|strong="G4633"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w*, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w Elijah|strong="G2243"\w*.”

\w While|strong="G1722"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w still|strong="G2089"\w* \w speaking|strong="G2980"\w*, \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w bright|strong="G5460"\w* \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w* enveloped \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* – “\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w my|strong="G3708"\w* dearly loved \w son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w brings|strong="G1510"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w great|strong="G2980"\w* joy; \w listen|strong="G2400"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.”

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w on|strong="G1909"\w* hearing \w this|strong="G3588"\w*, \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w faces|strong="G4383"\w*, \w greatly|strong="G4970"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w*.

\w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* touched \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w*, \wj “\+w Rise|strong="G1453"\+w* \+w up|strong="G1453"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w do|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w be|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w afraid|strong="G5399"\+w*.”\wj*

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w raised|strong="G1869"\w* \w their|strong="G3588"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*, \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w one|strong="G3762"\w* \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w himself|strong="G3441"\w* \w alone|strong="G3441"\w*.

\w As|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w going|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w* side, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w gave|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* warning – \wj “\+w Do|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3367"\+w* \+w speak|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w vision|strong="G3705"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w anyone|strong="G3367"\+w*, \+w until|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w Man|strong="G3367"\+w* \+w has|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w risen|strong="G1453"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w dead|strong="G3498"\+w*.”\wj*

“\w How|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w*,” \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w*, “\w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* teachers \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Law \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Elijah|strong="G2243"\w* \w has|strong="G5101"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w*?”

\wj “\+w Elijah|strong="G2243"\+w* \+w indeed|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w does|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w*,”\wj* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj “\+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* restore \+w everything|strong="G3956"\+w*;\wj*

\wj \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w I|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w Elijah|strong="G2243"\+w* \+w has|strong="G3748"\+w* \+w already|strong="G2235"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w people|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w recognized|strong="G1921"\+w* \+w him|strong="G3588"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w treated|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w him|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w just|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w as|strong="G3745"\+w* \+w they|strong="G2532"\+w* pleased. \+w In|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w same|strong="G3779"\+w* \+w way|strong="G3779"\+w*, \+w too|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w the|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w Man|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* destined \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* undergo \+w suffering|strong="G3958"\+w* \+w at|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w people|strong="G4160"\+w*’s \+w hands|strong="G5259"\+w*.”\wj*

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w understood|strong="G4920"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w had|strong="G3588"\w* \w spoken|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Baptist.

\w When|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w crowd|strong="G3793"\w*, \w a|strong="G2532"\w* man \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w up|strong="G4334"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w kneeling|strong="G2532"\w* \w down|strong="G1120"\w* \w before|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w said|strong="G2532"\w*,

“\w Master|strong="G2962"\w*, \w take|strong="G2532"\w* pity \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* epileptic \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w suffers|strong="G3958"\w* terribly; \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w often|strong="G4178"\w* \w falls|strong="G4098"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*;

\w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G4374"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w cure|strong="G2323"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.”

\wj “Faithless \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w perverse|strong="G1294"\+w* \+w generation|strong="G1074"\+w*!”\wj* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w exclaimed|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj “\+w how|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w long|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w must|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w be|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w among|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w*? \+w How|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w long|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w must|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2532"\+w* patience \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w*? \+w Bring|strong="G5342"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* boy \+w here|strong="G5602"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w*.”\wj*

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w rebuked|strong="G2008"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w demon|strong="G1140"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w boy|strong="G3816"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w cured|strong="G2323"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w very|strong="G2532"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*.

\w Afterward|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* \w up|strong="G4334"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G4334"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w privately|strong="G2398"\w*, “\w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w it|strong="G5101"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w drive|strong="G1544"\w* \w it|strong="G5101"\w* \w out|strong="G1544"\w*?”

\wj “\+w Because|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w so|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w little|strong="G3640"\+w* \+w faith|strong="G4102"\+w*!”\wj* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj “\+w For|strong="G1063"\+w*, \+w I|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w*, \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w your|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w faith|strong="G4102"\+w* \+w were|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w only|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w like|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w a|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w mustard|strong="G4615"\+w* \+w seed|strong="G2848"\+w*, \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w could|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w mountain|strong="G3735"\+w* ‘\+w Move|strong="G3327"\+w* \+w from|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w place|strong="G1563"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w*!’ \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w would|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be|strong="G2532"\+w* moved; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w nothing|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w would|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be|strong="G2532"\+w* impossible \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w*.”\wj*
\f + \fr 17.21 \ft Some later manuscripts add: But this kind does not go out except by prayer and fasting.\f*

\w While|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w together|strong="G4962"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \wj “\+w The|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w Man|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* destined \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w be|strong="G3195"\+w* \+w betrayed|strong="G3860"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* human \+w hands|strong="G5495"\+w*,\wj*

\wj \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w put|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w him|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* death, \+w but|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w on|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w third|strong="G5154"\+w* \+w day|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w he|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w rise|strong="G1453"\+w*.”\wj* \w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w greatly|strong="G4970"\w* \w distressed|strong="G3076"\w*.

\w After|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w reached|strong="G1519"\w* \w Capernaum|strong="G2584"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* collectors \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Temple tax \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Does|strong="G2064"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w Master|strong="G1320"\w* \w pay|strong="G5055"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Temple tax?”

“\w Yes|strong="G3483"\w*,” \w answered|strong="G3004"\w* \w Peter|strong="G2532"\w*. \w But|strong="G2532"\w*, \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w going|strong="G2532"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w*, \w before|strong="G1519"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w could|strong="G3588"\w* \w speak|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj “\+w What|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w do|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w think|strong="G1380"\+w*, \+w Simon|strong="G4613"\+w*? \+w From|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w whom|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w do|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w earthly|strong="G1093"\+w* \+w kings|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w take|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w taxes|strong="G2778"\+w* \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w tribute|strong="G2778"\+w*? \+w From|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w their|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w sons|strong="G5207"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w from|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w others|strong="G3588"\+w*?”\wj*

“\w From|strong="G3588"\w* \w others|strong="G3588"\w*,” \w answered|strong="G3004"\w* Peter. \wj “\+w Well|strong="G1065"\+w* \+w then|strong="G1161"\+w*,”\wj* continued \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \wj “\+w their|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w sons|strong="G5207"\+w* go \+w free|strong="G1658"\+w*.\wj*

\wj Still, \+w so|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w we|strong="G2532"\+w* don’\+w t|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w offend|strong="G4624"\+w* \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w*, \+w go|strong="G4198"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* throw \+w a|strong="G2532"\+w* line \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w sea|strong="G2281"\+w*; \+w take|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w first|strong="G4413"\+w* \+w fish|strong="G2486"\+w* \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* rises, open \+w its|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w mouth|strong="G4750"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w find|strong="G2147"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w a|strong="G2532"\+w* piece \+w of|strong="G2532"\+w* money. \+w Take|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w give|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* collectors \+w for|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w both|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w of|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w us|strong="G1325"\+w*.”\wj*
